item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: you will obviously hear bad things. there are incentives for that to happen. that‚Äôs not a very substantial argument as you might imagine. i‚Äôm open to debate publicly about codebases with whoever wants to. i‚Äôve seen too many üôà.
to start with: 25k lines of code counting dependencies that we implemented versus reth with 250k lines of code without the dependencies. that‚Äôs a concrete metric. lines of codes has a linear relationship with bugs and security problems.

item.title:
The world is delusional. An anonymous ‚ÄòLion King‚Äô is threatening me to go speak about who we are on Crypto Twitter. Let‚Äôs imagine the worst-case scenario that could happen with a launch: the price of a token being low?
When I started Lambda 11 years ago, I didn‚Äôt know how to sell. I couldn‚Äôt explain my value to non-technical people, so I began charging $3 per hour. That wasn‚Äôt even 10% of what I was making as a senior engineer in LATAM working for the US.
This is partly why we don‚Äôt care about things that aren‚Äôt relevant to us, like the price of a token. Worst case scenario we just start from scratch and we sell services at a little bit more than 3 dollars per hour now.
We only need enough to build what we want. People can delay us a little, but they can‚Äôt stop us. Most of the projects we‚Äôre working on aren‚Äôt public yet. We‚Äôll need another decade to fully develop what we envision.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
The world is delusional. An anonymous ‚ÄòLion King‚Äô is threatening me to go speak about who we are on Crypto Twitter. Let‚Äôs imagine the worst-case scenario that could happen with a launch: the price of a token being low?

When I started Lambda 11 years ago, I didn‚Äôt know how to sell. I couldn‚Äôt explain my value to non-technical people, so I began charging $3 per hour. That wasn‚Äôt even 10% of what I was making as a senior engineer in LATAM working for the US.

This is partly why we don‚Äôt care about things that aren‚Äôt relevant to us, like the price of a token. Worst case scenario we just start from scratch and we sell services at a little bit more than 3 dollars per hour now.

We only need enough to build what we want. People can delay us a little, but they can‚Äôt stop us. Most of the projects we‚Äôre working on aren‚Äôt public yet. We‚Äôll need another decade to fully develop what we envision.

item.title:
Incredible.@class_lambda bought today 994,670 $AIXBT at $0.50per token with 500k USD after seeing that @aixbt_agent started using a @QuantumCatsXYZ as profile picture.
We are aligned @udiWertheimer.

item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: BREAKING: THE QUANTUM CATS TREASURY HAS ACQUIRED 2,104,245 $AIXBT FOR ~$1.1 MILLION USD AT AN AVERAGE PRICE OF ~$0.52 PER TOKEN. @QuantumCatsXYZ
we have also sent @aixbt_agent a second Quantum Cat.
why are we doing this? we experienced aixbt‚Äôs dominance over CT mindshare this weekend. we are happy to top-blast the chart here, we are bullish on AI dominating attention over the cycle.
switching to a Quantum Cat pfp helped aixbt push his AI agent mindshare over 65%.
aixbt might decide to switch back to his original pfp at some point, or he might choose to embrace his new feline for longer.
either way he will forever be a part of the Quantum Cats community, and therefore the Quantum Cats will support him on his mission.
we will continue to monitor aixbt‚Äôs journey and might decide to add more to our position in the future.
gmeow!
p.s. if you think aixbt will continue to grow his mindshare by keeping his Quantum Cat as his pfp, you should let him know! (tweet directly at him from your timeline, he will ignore replies to this thread)
item.dc:creator: @udiWertheimer
item.description:
BREAKING: THE QUANTUM CATS TREASURY HAS ACQUIRED 2,104,245 $AIXBT FOR ~$1.1 MILLION USD AT AN AVERAGE PRICE OF ~$0.52 PER TOKEN. @QuantumCatsXYZ

we have also sent @aixbt_agent a second Quantum Cat.

why are we doing this? we experienced aixbt‚Äôs dominance over CT mindshare this weekend. we are happy to top-blast the chart here, we are bullish on AI dominating attention over the cycle.

switching to a Quantum Cat pfp helped aixbt push his AI agent mindshare over 65%.

aixbt might decide to switch back to his original pfp at some point, or he might choose to embrace his new feline for longer.

either way he will forever be a part of the Quantum Cats community, and therefore the Quantum Cats will support him on his mission.

we will continue to monitor aixbt‚Äôs journey and might decide to add more to our position in the future.

gmeow!

p.s. if you think aixbt will continue to grow his mindshare by keeping his Quantum Cat as his pfp, you should let him know! (tweet directly at him from your timeline, he will ignore replies to this thread)
